title: New: POSTAAL – Darkness
body:
**POSTAAL** know their way around a pop hook, and whilst their 2014 debut single, Freedom, set a high bar which they struggled to reach for a while after, their latest effort, _Darkness,_ is certainly a welcome return to form.

Bold, colourful pop music at it’s very best, Darkness is the right kind of anthemic – just yearning to be synced to a massive TV advert. Check out the video for it below.
